website_summaries.verdict: Although these vases aren't fancy, they are attractive and practical, and come at a price that's suitable for displaying large bouquets on a budget.
pros: These glass vases boast a simplistic yet practical design that looks great with almost any home style, and compliments artificial, dry, or fresh flowers
Glass has a bright, clear appearance
8-inch height is just right for many types of flowers, plus the wide opening can accommodate several stems
A great value, as you get 2 vase for one affordable price
cons: Glass is somewhat thin, and a few customers gripe about receiving vases that were chipped or broken when they arrived

website_summaries.verdict: A set of quality minimalist vases that fit in with any decor.
pros: Set of matching vases, perfect for placing on nightstands or end tables
Available in clear, red, green, rose, or pink
Vases are sturdy with a quality, weighted base
Sits at a low price point
cons: Vases are on the thin side, especially near the opening

customer_reviews.text: We used these for the centerpieces at our wedding. They looked great and you can't beat the price!

customer_reviews.title: great vase!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size of the vase. The vase can easily fit 2 dozen roses and it seems pretty sturdy. I washed them in my dishwasher several times and they look great.

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and had carefully searched a lot of different vendors and suppliers not just amazon. Found these and read the measurements. Said opening is 4 inches they only gave that measurement so I thought wow perfect. Well it is not 4 inches, I have a 3 inch candle that will not fit through the opening. So now I have to find a different candle and spend more money. Irritated to say the least since this is for my wedding. Better measurements would be nice since a fluted edge doesn't really count as the opening people would be worried about. Keeping the vases because the shape is what I need, but not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: but the price and the product are good.
customer_reviews.text: It's simple vase, but the price and the product are good.

product_meta.title: 8" Glass Rose Vase (Case of 2) #999 By Oasis Floral Products
product_meta.description: Color:clearA perfect size rose vase from an excellent manufacturer. Sold by the case of 2 with each vase specially bubble wrapped for extra protection during shipping. For Decorative Use Only. The 4" opening is measured at the top of the vase and it does taper down to a 2.75" width inside. Exact measurements of the vase: Opening: 4.13 inch Choke: 2.75 inch Base: 2.95 inch Volume: 51.8 oz
feature_bullets: 8" Tall x 4" Opening at the top
Cobalt Blue Glass with high quality finish
